casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy McNEILL. No. 615A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2004. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, John Watters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of December 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (McNeill) shall have up to and including the 4th day of February 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of December 2004."
